title: have a problem
body:
my account have problem
noone login my id but client has been disconnected so many times

replies.body: Can you expand a bit on the issue you're having? Are you having a login error or are you not able to connect to the PvP.net service? If you can [provide a screenshot](https://gyazo.com/) of the issue, I'll have a better idea of what's going on.

What do you mean "disconnected"? Technical issues or you have message saying someone else connected to the account? Change your password immediately if you got that message. And contact Player Support about that. Of course, never share your account and never click on weird links promising free RP/skins.
